column3: referred to as  the Respondent)  had  issued  a quit notice on  the Respondent

column2: - Petitioner - Appellant (hereinafter sometimes referred to as  the
Appellant),  in  terms of section  3 of the State Lands  (Recovery of
Possession)  Act (hereinafter sometimes  referred to as  the Act).
As  the Appellant had  failed  to respond  to the said  quit notice, the

column3: Respondent had  thereafter made  an  application  under section  5 of the Act
